title: Richard III: The Last Plantagenet
description: 1970. First Edition. 292 pages. No dust jacket. Beige cloth. From the personal library of previous owner, with expected ownership plates and inscriptions. Pages are clean and bright, and appear almost good as new. With minimal tanning throughout. Binding has remained firm. Boards are a little rub worn, slight shelf wear to corners, spine and edges. Corners are a little bumped. Spine ends are mildly crushed. Heavy tanning to spine and edges. Boards are slightly bowed. Slight forward lean to text block.
author: Michael Sidney Tyler-Whittle
